attributes.action: Lift the smoking ban in pubs taxis and bingo halls
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The smoking ban has caused many job losses,it is ripping the heart out of comunity spirit and it should be repealed from all pubs where food is not served,and extractors fitted, work places like taxis when no passengers are involved as the vehicles are the taxi owners personal transport when not being used as a taxi, all bingo halls and the Royal British legion
